ERROR.INVALID_START_END_DATES: Invalid date range. End date must be greater than start date.
ERROR.GUEST_NOT_FOUND: We could not locate your booking at this time, would you like to try again in sometime.
ERROR.LASTNAME_NOT_MATCH: Last name doesn't match with records. Please try again.
ERROR.DOCUMENT_NOT_VERIFIED: Document doesn't match. Please try a different document.
ERROR.FILEFORMAT_NOT_VALID: Invalid Document Type/Page. Recommended Types are Local ID, VISA and Passport.
ERROR.OCR_NAME_MISMATCH: Name doesn't match. Try with valid document.
ERROR.OCR_NATIONALITY_MISMATCH: Nationality doesn't match. Try with valid document.
ERROR.OCR_DOCUMENT_EXPIRED: Document {0} is expired. Try with valid document.
ERROR.OCR_EXCEPTION_CONNECT: Document upload unsuccessful . Try again in sometime.
ERROR.OCR_EXCEPTION_DOCUMENT: Document upload failed. Try a different document.
ERROR.SIGNATURE_MISSING: We request you to sign the document
ERROR.HEALTH_DECLARARTION_NOT_FOUND: Health Declaration Missing. Fill required details to continue.
ERROR.REGCARD_DOWNLOAD_FAILED: We could not fetch the document, please contact the front desk.
ERROR.INVALID_DATA: Data Invalid. Try a different request.
ERROR.STATUS_PENDING: Status Pending. Request needs to be initiated first
ERROR.RESERVATION_NOT_FOUND: We could not locate your booking at this time, would you like to try again in sometime.
ERROR.PMS_CHECKIN_FAILED: PMS Checkin failed. Try a different request or contact vendor
ERROR.PRECHECKIN_NOT_COMPLETED: Preheckin Incomplete. Complete Precheckin to proceed.
ERROR.CHECKIN_NOT_COMPLETED: Checkin Incomplete. Complete checkin to proceed.
ERROR.SERVER_ERROR: Server Issue. Try again in sometime.
ERROR.PMS_EXCEPTION: We are experiencing technical difficulties regarding your request , would you like to try in sometime.
ERROR.PMS_UPDATE_FAILED: PMS Update Failed. Please try again.
ERROR.CMS_EXCEPTION: We are experiencing technical difficulties regarding your service request. Contact Helpdesk for assistance.
ERROR.PAYMENT_EXCEPTION: Payment Unsuccessful due to code {0}. Please try again.
ERROR.PMS_REQUEST_FAILED: Requested Service is unavailable at the moment. Please try a different service or contact Helpdesk.
ERROR.CMS_JOB_EXCEPTION: Requested Service is unavailable at the moment. Please try a different service or contact Helpdesk.
ERROR.INVALID_ENUM_VALUE: Invalid Data. Please try a different dataset.
ERROR.BOOKING_CANCELED: Your booking is cancelled. Contact Helpdesk for assistance.
ERROR.WINDOW_CLOSED: Thank you for the confirmation. Your journey window is not open.
ERROR.SERVICE_WITHOUT_CHECKIN: Thank you. Your personal request has been noted. As per Hotel guidelines, Checkin is recommended before requesting service.
ERROR.PAYMENT_CONFIGURATION_NOT_FOUND: No payment configuration found for this hotel
